r.d:
go-pear is the online PEAR installer: just download it and run it (through a browser or command line), it will set up a minimal PEAR installation that will be ready for immediatel use.
You can download go-pear from http://pear.php.net/go-pear (this is merely the pearweb package hosting it)
r.n: Bugfixes: * Fixed temp_dir bug, see #13167 * PEAR servers switched from viewcvs to viewvc * fix proxy bug, see #14365 (jwerner)
